channel.title: CiTR -- In The Cage
channel.itunes:author: CiTR 101.9 Vancouver
channel.itunes:subtitle: Join Carlin Bardsley as he welcomes the top names in Canadian Mixed Martial Arts.

item.title: Broadcast on 08-Mar-2011
item.description: Take 3!
item.itunes:subtitle: Sarah Kaufman Interview

item.title: Broadcast on 08-Mar-2011
item.description: Former Strikeforce women's welterweight champion Sarah Kaufman re-joins the program to discuss her upcoming fight at AFC 5, the state of Strikeforce's women's division and how she feels about being a role model for up and coming Canadian female fighters. Plus UFC on Vs. 3 and Strikeforce Hendo vs. Feijao recaps and more! Don't you dare miss it!
item.itunes:subtitle: Sarah Kaufman In the Cage with Bards!

item.title: Broadcast on 22-Feb-2011
item.description: UFC Vice President Marc Ratner joins the program to discuss UFC's triumphant return to Vancouver! Plus West Coast MMA results and a UFC 127 preview!
item.itunes:subtitle: Marc Ratner In the Cage with Bards!

item.title: Broadcast on 15-Feb-2011
item.description:
Join the main event fighters from the upcoming West Coast MMA show as they stop by the program. Before Andrew "Sinister" Small and Murray 'Showtime' Sogen face off for the West Coast MMA Lightweight title, they'll step In the Cage with Bards!
Plus Strikeforce Fedor vs. Silva results, UFC does boffo biz in TO...and more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Andrew Small and Murray Sogen In the Cage with Bards!

item.title: Broadcast on 08-Feb-2011
item.description: Vancouver Athletic Commission member Jonathan Tweedale joins the show to discuss the MMA situation in Vancouver and the recent COMMAND course for judges that Big John McCarthy recently staged in the city. Plus a Strikeforce Grand Prix preview and UFC 126 review!
item.itunes:subtitle: Jonathan Tweedale In the Cage with Bards

item.title: Broadcast on 01-Feb-2011
item.description: UFC veteran and Prince George BC's own Bill "The Butcher" Mahood joins the program to discuss his career, his MMABC organization, picks for UFC: Silva vs. Belfort and MORE!
item.itunes:subtitle: Bill Mahood In the Cage with Bards!

item.title: Broadcast on 25-Jan-2011
item.description: Canadian boxing legend George Chuvalo stops by the program to talk about his career, fighting Muhammad Ali, his views on MMA and his Fight Against Drugs campaign.
item.itunes:subtitle: George Chuvalo In the Cage with Bards!

item.title: Broadcast on 18-Jan-2011
item.description: This week's show has Battlefield results, a look at the new incarnation of the Vancouver Athletic Commission, a preview of the new coaches of the next TUF season and what that means for Vancouver, plus a preview of this weekend's UFC Fight for the Troops 2!
item.itunes:subtitle: In the Cage with Bards!

item.title: Broadcast on 07-Dec-2010
item.description: TUF 12 recap, judging controversy, Strikeforce Henderson vs. babalu recap, UFC 124 preview and season's greetings!
item.itunes:subtitle: In the Cage with Bards!

item.title: Broadcast on 30-Nov-2010
item.description: Recently retired UFC veteran and product of Quebec joins the show to look back on his career, the time he choked out a pitbull and how he sees the GSP-Koscheck fight.
item.itunes:subtitle: Jonathan Goulet In the Cage with Bards!

item.title: Broadcast on 16-Nov-2010
item.description: The FUNDRIVE edition of In the Cage where you can hear a lot about how to donate to the station which broadcasts this little program.
item.itunes:subtitle: In the Cage with Bards FUNDRIVE edition!

item.title: Broadcast on 09-Nov-2010
item.itunes:subtitle: In the Cage with Bards!

item.title: Broadcast on 02-Nov-2010
item.description: Former Vancouver Athletic Commission Chairman Mirko Mladenovic joins the show to give the inside scoop on the controversy about MMA in Vancouver and the ongoing battle between the VAC and Vancouver City Hall.
item.itunes:subtitle: Mirko Mladenovic In the Cage with Bards!

item.title: Broadcast on 26-Oct-2010
item.description: UFC 121 recap, Battlefield Fight League results and information on how to apply to the Vancouver Athletic Commission!
item.itunes:subtitle: In the Cage with Bards!

item.title: Broadcast on 28-Sep-2010
item.description: Sportsnet's own "Showdown" Joe joins the show to discuss the UFC 119 results, MMA regulation and whether we could see him reffing in the octagon.
item.itunes:subtitle: Showdown Joe Ferraro In the Cage with Bards!

item.title: Broadcast on 21-Sep-2010
item.description: The Vancouver Sun's MMA columnist Chris Parry joins the show to complain about City Hall and preview UFC 119, which as Chris will tell you.... contains an Aussie!
item.itunes:subtitle: Chris Parry In the Cage with Bards!

item.title: Broadcast on 14-Sep-2010
item.description: Vancouver MMA legend Paul Lazenby joins the program to give us the latest on the MMA vs. Vancouver City Hall battle and previews the upcoming TUF season.
item.itunes:subtitle: Paul Lazenby In the Cage with Bards!

item.title: Broadcast on 24-Aug-2010
item.description: MFC President Mark Pavelich joins the show and talks about MFC's future plans, his views on MMA legalization in Ontario and the lack thereof in Vancouver, other promoters and more! Mark is definitely not afraid to share his views!
item.itunes:subtitle: Mark Pavelich In the Cage with Bards!

item.title: Broadcast on 17-Aug-2010
item.description: MMA legend "El Guapo" Bas Rutten joins us and discusses his career, the fall of Pride Fighting, training Kimbo Slice and some classic Bas party stories! Find out why everyone loves "El Guapo"!
item.itunes:subtitle: Bas Rutten In the Cage with Bards!

item.title: Broadcast on 10-Aug-2010
item.description: Red Deer's own UFC veteran Jason "The Athlete" MacDonald joins the show to discuss his career, ginger warfare, how he spends his Submission of the Night bonuses and other goings-on in the world of MMA.
item.itunes:subtitle: Jason MacDonald In the Cage with Bards!

item.title: Broadcast on 03-Aug-2010
item.description: Join us as we welcome "The Voice of MMA" Mauro Ranallo as our guest. Mauro shares all about his early beginnings, his days with Pride Fighting, his continued work with Strikeforce and a couple of stories involving midgets.
item.itunes:subtitle: Mauro Ranallo In the Cage with Bards!
